snippet: Britain’s National Archives has posted the first group of firsthand accounts of the war, but millions of more pages are still to come.
abstract: Britain's National Archives says it is putting diaries from British soldiers involved in World War I online; archives hold about 1.5 million pages of such accounts and 20 percent have been digitized.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s National Archives has posted the first group of firsthand accounts of the war, but millions of more pages are still to come.

headline.main: Now Online, Diaries of British Soldiers Detail Horrors of World War I
headline.print_headline: Now Online, Diaries of British Soldiers Detail Horrors of World War I
